title: Prawn cocktail
description: This classic starter gets a punchy update from the Hairy Bikers in the form of fiery central American additions. Each serving provides 373kcal, 27g protein, 6g carbohydrate (of which 4g sugars), 26g fat (of which 12g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 0.9g salt.

For the prawn cocktail: 1 red chilli, stalk removed, finely diced
small bunch fresh coriander leaves, chopped, plus extra sprigs to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
To serve: 1 large ripe avocado, peeled, stone removed, flesh sliced lengthways
4 large fresh cooked prawns, heads and shells intact

steps: For the prawn cocktail, mix together all of the prawn cocktail ingredients in a bowl until well combined. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.

To serve, divide the shredded lettuce equally among four serving dishes. Arrange the avocado slices on top, then spoon over the prawn cocktail mixture. Sprinkle over a pinch of cayenne pepper and garnish with a shell-on prawn and a sprig of coriander. Serve immediately.
